```py
>>> def histogram_intersection(a, b):
...     v = np.minimum(a, b).sum().round(decimals=1)
...     return v
>>> df = pd.DataFrame([(.2, .3), (.0, .6), (.6, .0), (.2, .1)],
...                   columns=['dogs', 'cats'])
>>> df.corr(method=histogram_intersection)
 dogs  cats
dogs   1.0   0.3
cats   0.3   1.0 
```

```py
>>> df = pd.DataFrame([(1, 1), (2, np.nan), (np.nan, 3), (4, 4)],
...                   columns=['dogs', 'cats'])
>>> df.corr(min_periods=3)
 dogs  cats
dogs   1.0   NaN
cats   NaN   1.0 
```
